text: The Men's 50 km walk event at the 2006 European Championships was held on Thursday August 10, 2006 in Gothenburg, Sweden, with the start at 09:40h. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style=" text-align:center; font-size:110%;" width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Yohann Diniz France (FRA) |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Jesús Ángel García Spain (ESP) |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Yuriy Andronov Russia (RUS) |} ==Abbreviations== *All times shown are in hours:minutes:seconds {| class="wikitable" style=" text-align:center;
